name: Tower Defense: Flying Island
description:
Tower Defense: Flying Island

In the game Tower Defense: Flying Island, you will find yourself on a wonderful flying island with beautiful views of the surrounding clouds. But the joy will not last long, because your island has become a target for computer robots who are trying to take over its resources.

Your task is to create the best defense system that can stop the attacks of enemies. You can place different towers with different types of weapons to defend your island. In addition, you can upgrade your towers to make them more powerful.

Your enemies will not stand still either. They will increase their attacks and use new technologies to leapfrog your defenses. You will need to look ahead and develop new defense strategies to counter the computer robots.

How play?
  • You can damage the enemy by clicking on them with the mouse, so you can earn the first funds on the tower, and also help your towers hold back the onslaught of the enemy.
  • Click on platforms to buy towers with earned funds.
  • Click on the towers to open the upgrade menu.
  • ESC - pause/restart/exit
